original: Vigrahavyāvartanī-kārikā //
sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaś cet /
analyzed: sarveṣām bhāvānām sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaḥ ced

original: tvadvacanam asvabhāvaṃ na nivartayituṃ svabhāvam alam // NagVvy_01
analyzed: tvad vacanam asvabhāvam na nivartayitum svabhāvam alam

original: atha savabhāvam etad vākyaṃ pūrvā hatā pratijñā te /
analyzed: atha sava bhāvam etat vākyam pūrvā hatā pratijñā te

original: vaiṣamikatvaṃ tasmin viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavyaḥ // NagVvy_02
analyzed: vaiṣamika tvam tasmin viśeṣa hetuḥ ca vaktavyaḥ

original: mā śabdavad ity etat syāt te buddhir na caitad upapannam /
analyzed: mā śabdavat iti etat syāt te buddhiḥ na ca etat upapannam

original: śabdena hy atra satā bhaviṣyato vāraṇaṃ tasya // NagVvy_03
analyzed: śabdena hi atra satā bhaviṣyataḥ vāraṇam tasya

original: pratiṣedhapratiṣedho 'py evam iti mataṃ bhavet tad asad eva /
analyzed: pratiṣedha pratiṣedhaḥ api evam iti matam bhavet tat asat eva

original: evaṃ tava pratijñā lakṣaṅato dūṣyate na mama // NagVvy_04
analyzed: evam tava pratijñā lakṣaṅataḥ dūṣyate na mama

original: pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvad yady upalabhya vinivartayasi bhāvān /
analyzed: pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvat yadi upalabhya vinivartayasi bhāvān

original: tan nāsti pratyakṣaṃ bhāvā yenopalabhyante // NagVvy_05
analyzed: tat na asti pratyakṣam bhāvāḥ yena upalabhyante

original: anumānaṃ pratyuktaṃ pratyakṣeṇāgamopamāne ca /
analyzed: anumānam pratyuktam pratyakṣeṇa āgama upamāne ca

original: anumānāgamasādhyā ye 'rthā dṛṣṭāntasādhyāś ca // NagVvy_06
analyzed: anumāna āgama sādhyāḥ ye arthāḥ dṛṣṭānta sādhyāḥ ca

original: kuśalānāṃ dharmāvasthāvidaś ca manyante /
analyzed: kuśalānām dharma avasthā vidaḥ ca manyante

original: kuśalaṃ janāḥ svabhāvaṃ śeṣeṣv apy eṣa viniyogaḥ // NagVvy_07
analyzed: kuśalam janāḥ svabhāvam śeṣeṣu api eṣa viniyogaḥ

original: nairyāṇikasvabhāvo dharmā nairyāṇikāś ca ye teṣām /
analyzed: nairyāṇika svabhāvaḥ dharmāḥ nairyāṇikāḥ ca ye teṣām

original: dharmāvasthoktānām evaṃ anairyāṇikādīnām // NagVvy_08
analyzed: dharma avasthā uktānām evam anairyāṇika ādīnām

original: yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāva ity evam /
analyzed: yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvaḥ dharmāṇām niḥsvabhāvaḥ iti evam

original: nāmāpi bhaven naivaṃ nāma hi nirvastukaṃ nāsti // NagVvy_09
analyzed: nāma api bhavet na evam nāma hi nirvastukam na asti

original: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyate tasmāt /
analyzed: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇām na vidyate tasmāt

original: dharmair vinā svabhāvaḥ sa yasya tad yuktam upadeṣṭum // NagVvy_10
analyzed: dharmaiḥ vinā svabhāvaḥ sa yasya tat yuktam upadeṣṭum

original: sata eva pratiṣedho nāsti ghaṭo geha ity ayaṃ yasmāt /
analyzed: sataḥ eva pratiṣedhaḥ na asti ghaṭaḥ gehe iti ayam yasmāt

original: dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣedho 'yaṃ sataḥ svabhāvasya te tasmāt // NagVvy_11
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ayam sataḥ svabhāvasya te tasmāt

original: atha nāsti sa svabhāvaḥ kiṃ nu pratiṣidhyate tvayānena /
analyzed: atha nā asti sa svabhāvaḥ kim nu pratiṣidhyate tvayā anena

original: vacanenarte vacanāt pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyate hy asataḥ // NagVvy_12
analyzed: vacanena ṛte vacanāt pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyate hi asataḥ

original: bālānāṃ iva mithyā mṛgatṛṣnāyāṃ yathājalagrāhaḥ /
analyzed: bālānām iva mithyā mṛgatṛṣnāyām yathā ajalagrāhaḥ

original: evaṃ mithyāgrāhaḥ syāt te pratiṣedhyato hy asataḥ // NagVvy_13
analyzed: evam mithyā grāhaḥ syāt te pratiṣedhyataḥ hi asataḥ

original: nanv evaṃ saty asti grāho grāhyaṃ ca tadgrahītā ca /
analyzed: nanu evam sati asti grāhaḥ grāhyam ca tad grahītā ca

original: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhā ceti ṣaṭkaṃ tat // NagVvy_14
analyzed: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyam pratiṣeddhā ca iti ṣaṭkam tat

original: atha naivāsti grāho naiva grāhyaṃ na ca grahītāraḥ /

original: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhāro nanu sa santi // NagVvy_15
analyzed: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyam pratiṣeddhāraḥ nanu sa santi

original: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhāraś ca yadyuta na santi /
analyzed: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyam pratiṣeddhāraḥ ca yadi uta na santi

original: siddhā hi sarvabhāvās teṣam eva svabhāvaś ca // NagVvy_16
analyzed: siddhāḥ hi sarva bhāvāḥ teṣam eva svabhāvaḥ ca

original: hetoś ca te na siddhir naiḥsvābhāvyāt kuto hi te hetuḥ /
analyzed: hetoḥ ca te na siddhiḥ naiḥsvābhāvyāt kutas hi te hetuḥ

original: nirhetukasya siddhir na copapannāsya te 'rthasya // NagVvy_17

original: yadi cāhetoḥ siddhiḥ svabhāvavinivartanasya te bhavati /

original: svābhāvyasyāstitvaṃ mamāpi nirhetukaṃ siddham // NagVvy_18
analyzed: svābhāvyasya astitvam mama api nirhetukam siddham

original: atha hetor astitvaṃ bhāvāsvābhāvyam ity anupapannam /

original: lokeṣu niḥsvabhāvo na hi kaś cana vidyate bhāvaḥ // NagVvy_19
analyzed: lokeṣu niḥsvabhāvaḥ na hi kaḥ cana vidyate bhāvaḥ

original: pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāt pratiṣedhyam ity anupapannam /
analyzed: pūrvam ced pratiṣedhaḥ paścāt pratiṣedhyam iti anupapannam

original: paścāc cānupapanno yugapac ca yataḥ svabhāvaḥ san // NagVvy_20

original: hetupratyayasāmagryāṃ ca pṛthak cāpi madvaco na yadi /
analyzed: hetu pratyaya sāmagryām ca pṛthak ca api mad vacaḥ na yadi

original: manu śūnyatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhāvānām asvabhāvatvāt // NagVvy_21
analyzed: manu śūnyatvam siddham bhāvānām asvabhāva tvāt

original: yaś ca pratītyabhāvo bhāvānāṃ śūnyateti sā proktā /

original: yaś pratītyabhāvo bhavati hi tasyāsvabhāvatvam // NagVvy_22

original: nirmitako nirmitakaṃ māyāpuruṣaḥ svamāyayā sṛṣṭam /
analyzed: nirmitakaḥ nirmitakam māyā puruṣaḥ sva māyayā sṛṣṭam

original: atha vā sādhyasamo 'yaṃ hetur na hi vidyate dhvaneḥ sattā /

original: saṃvyavahāraṃ ca vayaṃ nānabhyupagamya kathayāmaḥ // NagVvy_28

original: nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmān naivāsti me doṣaḥ // NagVvy_29

original: pratyakṣādibhir arthais tadabhāvān me 'nupālambhaḥ // NagVvy_30

original: yadi ca pramāṇatas te teṣāṃ teṣāṃ prasiddhir arthānām /

original: teṣāṃ punaḥ prasiddhiṃ brūhi kathaṃ te pramāṇānām // NagVvy_31

original: vaiṣamikatvaṃ tasmin viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavyaḥ // NagVvy_33

original: viṣamopanyāso 'yaṃ na hy ātmānaṃ prakāśayaty agniḥ /

original: na hi tasyānupalabdhir dṛṣṭā tamasīva kumbhasya // NagVvy_34
analyzed: na hi tasya anupalabdhiḥ dṛṣṭā tamasi iva kumbhasya

original: yadi ca prameyasiddhir nāpekṣyaiva bhavati pramāṇāni /

original: kiṃ te pramāṇasiddhyā tāni yadarthaṃ prasiddhaṃ tat // NagVvy_44

original: bhavati pramāṇasiddhir nāsty ubhayasyāpi te siddhiḥ // NagVvy_46

original: sādhyāni ca prameyais tāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti // NagVvy_47

original: sādhyāni ca pramāṇais tāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti // NagVvy_48
analyzed: sādhyāni ca pramāṇaiḥ tāni katham sādhayiṣyanti

original: pitrā yady utpādyaḥ putro yadi tena caiva putreṇa /
analyzed: pitrā yadi utpādyaḥ putraḥ yadi tena ca eva putreṇa

original: utpādyaḥ sa yadi pitā vada tatrotpādayati kaḥ kam // NagVvy_49

analyzed: kaḥ ca pitā kaḥ putraḥ tatra tvam brūhi tau ubhau api ca

original: pitṛputralakṣaṇadharau yato bhavati no 'tra saṃdehaḥ // NagVvy_50

original: kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmāvasthāvido bruvīran yat /

original: nādharmo dharmo vā saṃvyavahārāś ca laukikā na syuḥ /

original: nityāś ca sasvabhāvāḥ syur nityatvād ahetumataḥ // NagVvy_55

original: evam akuśaleṣv avyākṛteṣu nairyāṇikādiṣu ca doṣaḥ /

original: tasmāt sarvaṃ saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ te bhavaty eva // NagVvy_56

original: yaḥ sadbhūtaṃ nāmātra brūyāt sasvabhāva ity evam /
analyzed: yaḥ sadbhūtam nāma atra brūyāt sa svabhāvaḥ iti evam

original: bhavatā prativaktavyo nāma brūmaś ca na vayaṃ sat // NagVvy_57
analyzed: bhavatā prativaktavyaḥ nāma brūmaḥ ca na vayam sat

original: nāmāsad iti ca yad idaṃ tat kiṃ nu sato bhavaty utāpy asataḥ /

original: yadi hi sato yady asato dvidhāpi te hīyate vādaḥ // NagVvy_58

original: sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ śūnyatvaṃ copapāditaṃ pūrvam /
analyzed: sarveṣām bhāvānām śūnyatvam ca upapāditam pūrvam

original: sa upālambhas tasmād bhavaty ayaṃ cāpratijñāyāḥ // NagVvy_59
analyzed: saḥ upālambhaḥ tasmāt bhavati ayam ca apratijñāyāḥ

original: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyata itīdam /
analyzed: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇām na vidyate iti idam

original: āśaṅkitaṃ yad uktaṃ bhavaty anāśaṅkitaṃ tac ca // NagVvy_60
analyzed: āśaṅkitam yat uktam bhavati an āśaṅkitam tat ca

original: sata eva pratiṣedho yadi śūnyatvaṃ nanu prasiddham idam /
analyzed: sataḥ eva pratiṣedhaḥ yadi śūnyatvam nanu prasiddham idam

original: pratiṣedhayate hi bhavān bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvam // NagVvy_61
analyzed: pratiṣedhayate hi bhavān bhāvānām niḥsvabhāva tvam

original: pratiṣedhayase 'tha tvaṃ śūnyatvaṃ tac ca nāsti śūnyatvam /
analyzed: pratiṣedhayase atha tvam śūnyatvam tat ca na asti śūnyatvam

original: pratiṣedhaḥ sata iti te nanv eṣa vihīyate vādaḥ // NagVvy_62
analyzed: pratiṣedhaḥ sataḥ iti te nanu eṣa vihīyate vādaḥ

original: pratiṣedhayāmi nāhaṃ kiṃ cit pratiṣedhyam asti na ca kiṃ cit /
analyzed: pratiṣedhayāmi na aham kim cit pratiṣedhyam asti na ca kim cit

original: tasmāt pratiṣedhayasīty adhilaya eṣa tvayā kriyate // NagVvy_63
analyzed: tasmāt pratiṣedhayasi iti adhilayaḥ eṣa tvayā kriyate  /

original: yac cāharte vacanād asataḥ pratiṣedhavacanasiddhir iti /
analyzed: yat ca āharte vacanāt asataḥ pratiṣedha vacana siddhiḥ iti

original: atra jñāpayate vāg asad iti tan na pratinihanti // NagVvy_64
analyzed: atra jñāpayate vāc asat iti tat na pratinihanti

original: mṛgatṛṣṇādṛṣṭānte yaḥ punar uktas tvayā mahāṃś carcaḥ /
analyzed: mṛgatṛṣṇā dṛṣṭānte yaḥ punar uktaḥ tvayā mahān carcaḥ

original: tatrāpi nirṇayaṃ śṛṇu yathā sa dṛṣṭānta upapannaḥ // NagVvy_65
analyzed: tatra api nirṇayam śṛṇu yathā sa dṛṣṭānte upapannaḥ

original: sa yadi svabhāvataḥ syād grāho na syāt pratītya saṃbhūtaḥ /
analyzed: sa yadi svabhāvataḥ syāt grāhaḥ na syāt pratītya saṃbhūtaḥ

original: yaś ca pratītya bhavati grāho nanu śūnyatā saiva // NagVvy_66
analyzed: yaḥ ca pratītya bhavati grāhaḥ nanu śūnyatā sā eva

original: yadi ca svabhāvataḥ syād grāhaḥ kas taṃ nivartayed grāham /
analyzed: yadi ca svabhāvataḥ syāt grāhaḥ kaḥ tam nivartayet grāham

original: śeṣeṣv apy eṣa viddhis tasmād eṣo 'nupālambhaḥ // NagVvy_67
analyzed: śeṣeṣu api eṣa viddhiḥ tasmāt eṣaḥ an upālambhaḥ

original: etena hetvabhāvaḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvam eva sa samatvāt /
analyzed: etena hetu abhāvaḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvam eva sa sama tvāt

original: mṛgatṛṣṇādṛṣṭāntavyāvṛttividhau ya uktaḥ prāk // NagVvy_68
analyzed: mṛgatṛṣṇā dṛṣṭānta vyāvṛtti vidhau yaḥ uktaḥ prāk

original: yas traikālye hetuḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvam eva sa samatvāt /
analyzed: yaḥ traikālye hetuḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvam eva sa sama tvāt

original: traikālyapratihetuś ca śūnyatāvādināṃ prāptaḥ // NagVvy_69
analyzed: traikālya pratihetuḥ ca śūnyatā vādinām prāptaḥ

original: prabhavati ca śūnyateyaṃ yasya prabhavanti tasya sarvārthāḥ /
analyzed: prabhavati ca śūnyatā iyam yasya prabhavanti tasya sarva arthāḥ

original: prabhavati na tasya kiṃ cin na prabhavati śūnyatā yasya // NagVvy_70
analyzed: prabhavati na tasya kim cit na prabhavati śūnyatā yasya

original: yaḥ śūnyatāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ madhyamāṃ pratipadaṃ ca /
analyzed: yaḥ śūnyatām pratītyasamutpādam madhyamām pratipadam ca

original: ekārthāṃ nijagāda praṇamāmi tam apratimabuddham // NagVvy_71 %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
analyzed: eka arthām nijagāda praṇamāmi tam apratima buddham
